import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import { InputGroup, InputGroupText, Input } from "reactstrap"; import { useState } from 'react'; import Position from './Position'; import Orientation from './Orientation'; import Size from './Size'; import Lighting from './Lighting'; import Settings from './Settings'; import BreadcrumbsPos from './BreadcrumbsPos'; function TriggerForm({data, index, updateTrigger}) { const [tempPosX, setTempPosX] = useState('') const [tempPosY, setTempPosY] = useState('') const [tempPosZ, setTempPosZ] = useState('') return ( <>

X: {data.Triggers[index].Position[0]} setTempPosX(e.target.value)}>
Y: {data.Triggers[index].Position[1]} setTempPosY(e.target.value)}>
Z: {data.Triggers[index].Position[2]} setTempPosZ(e.target.value)}>

Breadcrumbs

 ) } export default TriggerForm;
